name: culinarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is connected with cooking or kitchens: Edible flowers may be used culinarily in a variety of ways. The food at events has become more culinarily diverse in recent years.
More examplesFewer examplesThe menu is sophisticated enough for the most culinarily discerning adult, but the kids will love it as well.Aubergine is especially useful culinarily because it is able to absorb great amounts of cooking fats and flavour. The food comes from several different regions, which are distinct culinarily.
